subject: Horse Racing
Doping (Sports)
Horses
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Sheik Mohammed bin Rashid al-Maktoum of Dubai, and Godolphin, his global horse racing enterprise, have been the talk of Britain after 11 of his best horses tested positive for banned steroids.
snippet: Sheik Mohammed bin Rashid al-Maktoum of Dubai, and Godolphin, his global horse racing enterprise, have been the talk of Britain after 11 of his best horses tested positive for banned steroids.
